00017 import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET
00018 import os

00020 ## settings() class
00021 #  
00022 #  The instance of this class generates the settings object required by several
00023 #  other objects. It inherits from dict primitive
00024 class settings(dict): 
00025     """Just a container for most settings shared between several objects.
00026        Settings that are automatically defined:
00027        - basedir
00028        - current working directory (cwd) - initially usr/worked - but can be overriden
00029        by settings from the loaded model (project.xml)
00030     
00031        Settings that are loaded from XML files:
00032        - menu widget ??? - put the path to resources in the XML file menu.xml ???
00033        - upper toolbox widget ??? - same as for the menu widget ???
00034        - canvas widget
00035        - XML Editor
00036        - console
00037        - status bar???"""
00038     ## The constructor
00039     # 
00040     #  Takes the 
00041     #  @param master
00042     #  argument which is the instance of the Application() class
00043     def __init__(self, master):
00044         """TODO:: define actions ..."""
00045         dict.__init__(self)
00046 
00047         ## @var self.master
00048         #  Holds a reference to the Application() type object
00049         self.master = master
00050         
00051                 ## @var self["basedir"]
00052                 #  Determines the base directory (Tkad.py directory)
00053                 #
00054                 #  Its value assumes that the main script starts from the Tkad.py directory
00055         self["basedir"] = os.getcwd() 
00056         
00057                 ## @var self["cwd"]
00058                 #  Determines the current working directory
00059                 #
00060                 #  Reads etc/paths.xml LastWorkingDir element. If a project is opened, this 
00061                 #  setting is overwritten by the project setting
00062         self["cwd"] = ""
00063 
00064         # ----------------------------- widgets settings ----------------------------- 
00065 
00066         # Menu
00067         self["menuIconsPath"] = os.path.join(self["basedir"], "resources/icons16x16/menu") # add possibilities for multiple resolutions        
00068         self["menuXMLPath"]   = os.path.join(self["basedir"], "etc/gui/menus.xml") 
00069         self["menu"]          = {"icons":{}}
00070         
00071         # Upper toolbar
00072         self["upperToolBarIconsPath"] = "resources/icons22x22/uptoolbar"
00073         self["upperToolBarXMLPath"]   = "etc/gui/uppertoolbar.xml"
00074         self["upperToolBar"]          = {"icons":{}} # ????
00075         
00076         # Left toolbar
00077         self["leftToolBarIconsPath"] = "resources/icons22x22/lefttoolbar"
00078         self["leftToolBarXMLPath"]   = "etc/gui/lefttoolbar.xml"
00079         self["leftToolBar"]          = {"icons":{}} # ????
00080         
00081         # Canvas
00082         self["canvasXMLPath"] = os.path.join("etc/gui/canvas.xml")
00083         self["canvas"]        = {}
00084         
00085         # root Frame
00086         self.appTitle="Tkad - version 0.0.0a"        
00087         self.master.SetTitle(self.appTitle)
00088         self.master.SetSize((800, 600))
00089         self.master.Centre()
00090         self.master.Maximize()
00091         
00092         # ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093         
00094         # other useful paths
00095         self["extraModulesPath"] = {}     # relative/absolute paths???
00096         self["XMLPath"] = "etc/paths.xml" # canvas.xml and others ???
00097 
00098 
00099         self.__parseXMLData()
00100 
00101     def __parseXMLData(self): # canvas.xml and others ???
00102         """Parses the default paths.xml file into the self["extraModulesPath"]"""
00103 
00104         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00105         root = tree.getroot()
00106         
00107         # modules:
00108         
00109         for i in root.getiterator('module'):
00110             self["extraModulesPath"][i[0].text] = i[1].text
00111             
00112         # lwd:
00113         
00114     def addXMLData(self, data, element):
00115         """Adds data to XML file paths.xml"""
00116         
00117         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00118         root = tree.getroot() 
00119 
00120         if (root.find(data).tag == data):
00121 
00122             if data == 'modules':
00123                 self["extraModulesPath"][element['name']] = element['path']
00124                 module = tree.SubElement(root.find(data), 'module')
00125                 name   = tree.SubElement(module, 'name')
00126                 name.text = element['name']
00127                 path   = tree.SubElement(module, 'path')
00128                 path.text = element['path']
00129             
00130             if data == "cwd":
00131                 self['cwd'] = element
00132                 lwd = root.find(data)
00133                 lwd.text = element
00134          
00135             tree.write(self["XMLPath"], encoding = "UTF-8")
00136          
00137     def removeXMLData(self, data, element):
00138         """Removes data to XML file paths.xml"""
00139         
00140         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00141         root = tree.getroot() 
00142 
00143         if (root.find(data).tag == data) and (element in self["extraModulesPath"]):
00144             if data == 'modules':
00145                 del self["extraModulesPath"][element]
00146                 module = root.find('modules')
00147                 for i in module.findall('module'):   
00148                     if i[0].text == element:
00149                         module.remove(i)
00150             
00151             if data == "cwd": # resets to default /usr/worked
00152                 self['cwd'] = 'usr/worked'
00153                 lwd = root.find(data)
00154                 lwd.text = 'usr/worked'
00155                 
00156             tree.write(self["XMLPath"], encoding = "UTF-8")
00157         
00158     def __call__(self, data): # must define
00159         """Call the settings instance with the project.xml settings in order to 
00160         override some of its attributes with the information found in it."""
00161         if data == "menu":
00162             return (self["menuXMLPath"], self["menuIconsPath"])
00163         if data == "uppertoolbar":
00164             return (self["upperToolBarXMLPath"], self["upperToolBarIconsPath"])
00165         if data == "lefttoolbar":
00166             return (self["leftToolBarXMLPath"], self["leftToolBarIconsPath"])
